articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Winter River-crossing Attack Tactical Drill
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Winter River-crossing Attack Tactical Drill
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and  chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, guided the winter river-crossing attack tactical drill of the reinforced tank and armored infantry regiment.
					 The purpose of the drill was to let sub-units of tankmen and armored infantrymen conduct forced crossing and pursuit combat so that they may acquire methods of coordinated operation and combat to wipe out under the cover of flying corps the enemy troops which rapidly went over to defence and thus confirm the feasibility of the operation and combat plan and further round off the combat preparations.
					
					 At the observation post he received a report of the commander of the First Tank and Armored Infantry Regiment of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army and issued an order to start the drill.
					
					 An engineering reconnaissance was conducted before combatants crossed the frozen river like the lightning. Then they stormed and occupied heights of the enemy on the opposite bank of the river all of a sudden before moving to the depth of its area and fire power strike means of the regiment pounded the "enemy" bases.
					
					 Upon receiving the call of the regiment for fire support, helicopter gunships made successive merciless air raids on the targets.
					
					 The grounds of amphibious tanks and armored cars crossing the river and the sound of blowing up ice for building floating-bridges seemed to rock heaven and earth.
					
					 The crossing ground was reminiscent of a cauldron as tanks and armored cars broke through the "enemy's" defense line like the wind and made a hot pursuit of the fleeing enemy troops.
					
					 Pleased to see the successful training, respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un highly praised the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army, saying it is distinguished, indeed, as it is widely known to be the strongest in the People's Army.
					
					 He underscored the need for the People's Army to frequently organize more similar high-intensity rehearsals under the simulated conditions of a real war in the future irrespective of seasons and day and night to suit the natural and geographical and climatic features of Korea so as to steadily study and round off the combat methods and accumulate a wealth of combat experience. He called for more firmly preparing all tanks and armored cars of the People's Army so that they may perform any operation and combat duty independently and pro-actively and thus overcome mountains, marshlands, rivers and streams in the theaters of offensive operations in the southern part at one go and wipe out the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces like the lightning.
					
					 He gave instructions which would serve as guidelines for rounding off the combat preparations of the KPA.
					
					 He stressed that its service personnel should make their training more intensive the way the anti-Japanese guerrillas did in Mt. Paektu as required by the Party's policy of bringing about a radical turn in training, always bearing in mind that their training leads to the square of a military parade celebrating national reunification and bolstering up the army guarantees the victorious advance of the Korean revolution and a bright future of the socialist country.

articles.title: Builders of Ryomyong Street Vow to Finish Project before Day of Sun
articles.content:
Builders of Ryomyong Street Vow to Finish Project before Day of Sun
Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- An army-people rally took place on the spot on Jan. 27 to vow to finish the construction of Ryomyong Street without fail before the Day of the Sun, in hearty response to the on-site instructions of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					Present there were Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission and director of the KPA General Political Bureau, officials of party and armed forces organs and KPA commanding officers and civilian officials, solider-builders and civilian shock brigade members involved in the construction.
					
					Hwang said in his report that Kim Jong Un showed his deep trust in all the servicepersons and civilians involved in the construction of Ryomyong Street and greatly encouraged them during his inspection of the construction site.
					
					The reporter noted that Kim Jong Un expressed his great satisfaction over the progress of the street construction while going round its various parts for hours and ardently called for completing the construction till the Day of the Sun without fail.
					
					The reporter stressed that the construction of Ryomyong Street should be finished at the highest level, true to Kim Jong Un's on-site instructions.
					
					The speakers expressed the resolve to complete the project without fail before the Day of the Sun and thus fully demonstrate before the world that Korea's victory is truth and science.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Great Leaders on Lunar New Year's Day
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Great Leaders on Lunar New Year's Day
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The servicepersons, working people from all walks of life and school youth and children in the DPRK laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the lunar New Year's Day, Juche 106 (2017).
					 Seen before the statues on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang was a floral basket from Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and institutions, industrial establishments and schools at all levels and other units in Pyongyang.
					
					 Also placed there was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The visitors made deep bows to the statues.
					
					 The statues of the great leaders and their smiling portraits at Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other parts of Pyongyang were visited by many citizens carrying floral baskets and bouquets.
					
					 Meanwhile, servicepersons, working people and school youth and children across the country visited the statues of the great leaders and their smiling portraits in their residential areas.

articles.title: DPRK People Enjoy Lunar New Year's Day
articles.content:
DPRK People Enjoy Lunar New Year's Day
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and civilians in the DPRK celebrated lunar New Year's Day, Juche 106 (2017).
					 Many people visited the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state. They paid tribute to the smiling portraits of the great leaders in the plaza.
					
					 Servicepersons, working citizens from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues and portraits of the great leaders on Mansu Hill and in other parts of the country to pay homage to them.
					
					 Art performances were given in Pyongyang and local areas to liven up the festive mood.
					
					 Meanwhile, working citizens and school youth and children across the country enjoyed the holiday, playing folk games. A kite-flying contest of schoolchildren from across the country was staged at Kim Il Sung Square and in front of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace.
					
					 Catering establishments served various traditional foods and dishes to the citizens enjoying the lunar New Year's Day.

articles.title: Security Authorities' Violation of Prisoners' Rights Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Security Authorities' Violation of Prisoners' Rights Disclosed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The "Worker's Book" joint action against repression by the "Security Law" in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 23 to disclose the security authorities' violation of the rights of prisoners of conscience, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Chamsesang.
					 Speakers at the conference charged that rights of prisoners of conscience have been violated at prisons though penalty for them was not decided.
					
					 They demanded a halt to the said abuses under the fascist evil law.

articles.title: Official of Korean Youth Body in China Vow to Usher in Heyday of Nation-wide Reunification Movement
articles.content:
Official of Korean Youth Body in China Vow to Usher in Heyday of Nation-wide Reunification Movement
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Han Song Ok, director of the Publicity Department of the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China, on Jan. 24 issued a statement "We will vigorously turn out in the nation-wide sacred struggle for national reunification under the banner of national independence and great national unity."
					 The statement declared that the Federation would discharge the duty and mission of overseas young Koreans in the vigorous struggle to usher in a heyday of the nationwide movement for reunification and strive to do something helpful to making this year a meaningful year in opening up a new phase for the country's independent reunification.

articles.title: Koreans in China Vow to Struggle for National Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in China Vow to Struggle for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement on Jan. 22 in support of the appeal adopted at the joint conference of the DPRK's government, political parties and organizations.
					 The statement expressed the will of the Koreans in China to stand in the van of the struggle for implementing the line and policy of the country's independent reunification, cherishing in their mind the high pride and dignity of being members of the great Kim Il Sung's nation.

articles.title: 15th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Class Marked in Mongolia
articles.content:
15th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Class Marked in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- An event took place at the Korean Friendship Cultural Centre in Mongolia on Jan. 21 to celebrate the 15th anniversary of the birth of Kim Jong Il Class at the "Gor King-Erdene" Institute of Teachers.
					 Displayed at its venue were works of leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and books introducing the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 Attending the event were the rector and teaching staff of the Institute and officials of the DPRK Embassy and the Centre.
					
					 The rector said that all the teaching staff and students of the Institute have always stood by the Korean people for the past 10-odd years since a class named after leader Kim Jong Il came into being at the Institute.
					
					 The Institute concentrates its efforts on implanting a proper world outlook, including the principle of the Juche idea, in the mind of its students and training them to be competent talents, the rector said, adding: We will strive to make the students of Kim Jong Il class become a model in every aspect and reliable pillars shouldering the future of Mongolia with high pride.
					
					 The participants watched a Korean film "Okryu Children's Hospital".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Romania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Romania
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A Romanian preparatory committee for celebrating the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Jan. 19.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to set a celebration period from Jan. 20 to Feb. 16 and introduce Kim Jong Il's works through media and organize such political and cultural events as seminar and meeting praising his exploits in the period.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Kuwait
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A Kuwaiti preparatory committee for celebrating leader Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed on Jan. 19.
					 Javid Ahmad, director of the Administrative Department of the Kuwait Times and chairman of the Kuwaiti preparatory committee for the Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to set a celebration period from Jan. 19 to Feb. 18 and give wide publicity to Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits and organize such political and cultural events as meeting, seminar and film show in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Demark
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Demark
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Copenhagen, Denmark on Jan. 21.
					 H. Jacobsen, member of the Leadership of the Communist Party in Denmark, and Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits on the anniversary.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios invernales de cruce de rio de regimiento de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios invernales de cruce de rio de regimiento de EPC
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio los ejercicios de tactica de ataque para el cruce de rio en la estacion invernal del regimiento reforzado de la infanteria blindada de tanque.
					El entrenamiento tiene por objetivo determinar la realidad del plan de operacion y batalla y perfeccionar aun mas los preparativos de combate, al adiestrar las subunidades de tanquistas y infantes blindados los movimientos cooperativos y los metodos de accion de combate para aniquilar bajo el apoyo de la aviacion a los enemigos que pasaron apresuradamente a la defensa, persiguiendoles tras cruzar rapidamente el rio.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente escucho en el puesto de vigilancia el informe de decision del jefe del primer regimiento de la infanteria del blindaje de tanque de la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su y dio la orden del inicio del entrenamiento.
					
					Hubo la exploracion de zapadores. Luego de cruzar rapidamente el rio congelado, los uniformados asaltaron y ocuparon las cotas dominantes de la costa opuesta y se movieron hacia la profundidad y los medios de golpe con fuegos del regimiento golpearon las supuestas bases "enemigas".
					
					Acto seguido, en el espacio aereo del blanco aparecieron los helicopteros armados, llamados por el regimiento a fin del apoyo con fuegos, que emprendieron el ataque aereo despiadado.
					
					Se volo el hielo del rio para instalar el puente flotante y abrir el camino por donde avancen los tanques y los carros blindados, que destruyeron la linea de defensa "enemiga" y persiguieron a los enemigos en fuga.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente se alegro mucho por haber realizado exitosamente los ejercicios y evaluo altamente la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su, reconocida como la mas fuerte en el EPC.
					
					Senalo que tambien en el futuro el EPC debe organizar y realizar mucho mas sin distincion de las estaciones ni el dia y noche ni el tiempo los intensivos entrenamientos supuestos a la batalla real como el de hoy, conforme a las caracteristicas topograficas, meteorologicas y climaticas del pais, en aras de perfeccionar las tacticas y adquirir muchas experiencias combativas. Refirio que todos los tanques y las fuerzas armadas blindadas del EPC deben prepararse firmemente para cumplir de modo independiente y activo cualesquiera misiones operacionales y combativas y agrego que de esta manera deben superar de un tiron las montanas, los pantanos y rios situados en las zonas operacionales de la parte surena y exterminar con celeridad a los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					Seguidamente, dio las instrucciones que serviran de guia en hacer estrictos preparativos de combate del EPC.
					
					Finalizo que los uniformados deben avivar furiosamente el fervor de entrenamiento Paektusan de acuerdo con la demanda de la orientacion del partido en materia de la revolucion del entrenamiento, teniendo bien presente que el camino de adiestramiento esta extendido hacia la plaza de desfile militar dedicado a la reunificacion de la patria y el fortalecimiento de la capacidad militar garantiza el avance victorioso de la revolucion coreana y el futuro radiante de la patria socialista.

articles.title: Coreanos rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il por el Ano Nuevo Lunar
articles.content:
Coreanos rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il por el Ano Nuevo Lunar
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo Lunar 106 (2017) de la Era Juche, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y ninos escolares de todo el pais rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il ante sus estatuas de bronce y retratos con amplia sonrisa levantados en las respectivas localidades. 
					Al pie de las estatuas de bronce de los grandes Lideres en la capitalina colina Mansu estaba colocado un cesto de flores enviado por el Maximo Dirigente del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Fueron depositados en el mismo lugar los cestos y ramos de flores a nombre de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, unidades del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los organismos, empresas, fabricas, escuelas, etc. a todos niveles en esta capital.
					
					Tambien, fue colocado un cesto de flores a nombre de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Las ceremonias de homenaje tuvieron lugar tambien ante las estatuas de bronce e imagenes sonrientes de los lideres antecesores levantadas en la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo, la Casa de Creacion Mansudae y otros lugares de la capital y las localidades.

articles.title: Celebran en Corea el Ano Nuevo Lunar 2017
articles.content:
Celebran en Corea el Ano Nuevo Lunar 2017
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- Los militares y habitantes coreanos celebraron con mucha alegria el Ano Nuevo Lunar 106 (2017) de la Era Juche.
					Con motivo de la fiesta folclorica, los capitalinos concurrieron a la explanada del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, donde estan conservados los cuerpos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, y a las estatuas de bronce de estos lideres erguidas en la capitalina colina Mansu.
					
					Ellos rindieron homenaje a los lideres antecesores ante sus estatuas de bronce y retratos con amplia sonrisa.
					
					Hicieron otro tanto los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y ninos escolares a lo largo del pais.
					
					Fomentaron el ambiente festivo las funciones artisticas que se ofrecieron en la capital y las localidades.
					
					Los trabajadores y los jovenes y ninos escolares festejaron el Ano Nuevo Lunar con divertidos juegos folkloricos.
					
					Se efectuo la competencia nacional de ninos y escolares de hacer volar las cometas en la Plaza Kim Il Sung y en la explanada frente al Palacio de Ninos y Escolares de Mangyongdae.
					
					Tambien, se entablaron diferentes juegos folcloricos en las explanadas de Hamhung, Haean, Kanggye y Phohang y otros lugares del pais.
					
					Este dia, las redes de servicios gastronomicos estuvieron llenas de los clientes que saborearon los platos de fiesta.
